channel.title: Gauntlet calendar feature request: Filter games by time of day
channel.description:
My apologies if this is not a good place to post this.
I submitted a feature request for the Gauntlet calendar directly through Github. The developer said I should run the idea by Lowell. Is that you, @edige23 ?
Filtering by time of day would let me easily see which games were at times that I was prepared to play. The full feature request is here: https://github.com/srcooney/TheGauntletWebsite/issues/1

item.title: Gauntlet calendar feature request: Filter games by time of day
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

I will check in with the developer.

Read full topic
